name: Picross Pushers
description:
A Puzzlescript game which combines the gameplay of Picross (a.k.a. Nonogram) and Sokoban into a whole new puzzle experience.
Arrow Keys/WASD: Walk - X/Space/Enter: Hint - Z: Undo - R: Restart - ESC: Back to main menu - Need more help?

New! We now also have an Android version! Play Picross Pushers wherever you are. You can download it here below.
